mapper.insert: insert into tb_girls ( _id, createdAt, publishedAt, `source`, url, used ) values ( #{_id}, #{createdAt}, #{publishedAt}, #{source}, #{url}, #{used} )

insert into tb_girls ( _id, createdAt, publishedAt, `source`, url, used ) values
( #{item._id}, #{item.createdAt}, #{item.publishedAt}, #{item.source}, #{item.url}, #{item.used} )
mapper.select: select * from tb_girls where used=true order by createdAt desc limit #{start},#{size};

select a._id,a.name,a.createdAt,a.publishedAt,a.source,a.used,a.url from tb_girls a where 1 = 1
and ( a.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYW}),'%') )
order by createdAt desc
mapper.update: update tb_girls set `name`=#{NAME}, createdAt=#{CREATEDAT}, publishedAt=#{PUBLISHEDAT}, source=#{SOURCE}, used=#{USED}, url=#{URL} where _id=#{_ID}
